From Maharashtra's Rs 2.25 crore for Mandhana and Rodrigues to Andhra Pradesh's Rs 2.5 crore for Shree Charani, these honours highlight the immense pride and inspiration the team has brought to every corner of the nation.

The sub-registrar insists on full payment before re-submitting the cancellation deed.

Hrithik Roshan comforts ex-wife Sussanne as she mourns mother Zarine Khan
description: Zarine Khan, mother of Sussanne and Zayed Khan, has passed away at 81. Bollywood celebrities gathered at Sanjay Khan's Mumbai residence to pay their respects. Hrithik Roshan was seen supporting his ex-wife Sussanne during the emotional time. Many stars attended the funeral, offering condolences to the family. Hrithik and Sussanne's continued warm bond remains a talking point.

title: Lauren Kyle launches Oilers Collection 03, a racing-inspired Sports Club Atelier line
description: Lauren Kyle, founder of Sports Club Atelier and wife of Connor McDavid, has unveiled "Oilers Collection 03," a new capsule inspired by classic motorsport style. The collection blends the Oilers' iconic colors with high-end streetwear and automotive aesthetics, drawing from vintage racing suits and team heritage. Kyle shared a preview on Instagram, highlighting the performance-driven fashion.

title: 116-year-old world’s oldest living woman's secret to long life is not exercise but...
description: At 116 years old, Ethel Caterham is officially the oldest person alive.  She credits her incredible lifespan not to strict diets or intense workouts, but to a calm mind.  Her key to living so long?  She avoids arguments and always sticks to her own decisions, living life on her own terms.

title: Marshawn Kneeland death: Darius Slay’s wife Jennifer shares emotional plea
description: Dallas Cowboys defensive end Marshawn Kneeland, 24, died by self-inflicted gunshot wound days after scoring his first NFL touchdown. His death followed a brief police pursuit. The tragedy has prompted widespread grief and calls for greater mental health awareness in the NFL, with many teammates and public figures sharing their sorrow and support.

title: Exclusive: Milind Soman at 60 says he feels stronger, lighter & freer than at 30
description: Looking good is temporary. Feeling good is timeless believes the actor-runner.

title: ‘Gaza genocide’ page: Wikipedia co-founder ‘agrees’ with Musk; Tesla CEO called site 'biased'
description: Wikipedia co-founder Jimmy Wales has intervened in an editorial dispute over the platform's "Gaza genocide" article, citing a violation of neutrality. He stated the article's lead paragraph presents a contested claim as fact, failing to meet Wikipedia's standards. This intervention aligns with Elon Musk's prior accusations of a left-wing bias on the platform.

title: Apple's CarPlay Ultra: Automakers in split with adoption; Ford CEO warns of overreach
description: Ford CEO Jim Farley expressed strong concerns about Apple's CarPlay Ultra, fearing it encroaches too deeply into vehicle control. He questioned how far Apple's brand should extend into car functions, emphasizing the digital experience as a key differentiator for future vehicles. This follows similar reservations from other automakers and GM's decision to drop both CarPlay and Android Auto.

title: Sidney Crosby future: GM Kyle Dubas makes firm call on Penguins captain
description: Pittsburgh Penguins GM Kyle Dubas has definitively stated that captain Sidney Crosby's future remains with the team. Dubas emphasized his commitment to building a contending roster around Crosby, with no plans to trade the veteran.  He believes continued success and winning are the best solutions for the team's long-term vision.

title: Bezos’ ex-wife’s gift: MacKenzie Scott's Howard donation; how is it important?
description: MacKenzie Scott has gifted Howard University $80 million, one of the largest single donations in its history, to support general operations and its College of Medicine. This significant contribution arrives as the university faces delays in federal funding due to a government shutdown. The donation continues Scott's recent pattern of substantial gifts to diversity, equity, and inclusion initiatives.

title: Gisele Bündchen says prioritizing Tom Brady took a toll: “Love isn’t a jail
description: Supermodel Gisele Bündchen, in a candid interview, shared insights into her marriage with Tom Brady, describing their split as a 'death and rebirth.' She detailed her journey of shifting from supporting her partner's career to rediscovering her own dreams and defining personal success. Bündchen emphasizes her graciousness towards Brady, highlighting her focus on authenticity and fulfillment in her new chapter.
